title: Best skill max order on new Ryze?
body:
I am trying currently to max Q then E then W. This is because the new E gives fantastic new effects when combined with his other skills, and they increase if you max it. In addition, W is mostly useful for its root rather than for its damage. 

However, maybe I am wrong and Q > W > E is still the way to go. Or maybe I should actually max E > Q > W.

Suggestions?

replies.body:
Q->E->W

W is just a root and not worth the rank up.

I think Q -> E -> W is best.  The E bonus when hit with Q increases Q damage by a %.  This makes the points in Q extra powerful.

Also, Q gives passive movement speed, also making it valuable to max first.


I could see E being maxed first in a super passive lane possibly.  I'm not 100% sure which of the 2 is better waveclear.
